string.value: It looks like #p1012118# has finally accepted you. Try using #b#p1012118##k's Training Center.

All of the monsters inside #p1012118#'s Training Center are easy monsters like #o0210100#s and #o1210100#s. When you complain about that, #p1012118# says that he will train you himself and tells you to hunt #o1210101#s...\r\n\r\n#o1210101##r #a225191##k
When you finishing hunting all of the #o1210101#s, #p1012118# says that you are amazing and gives you the #p1012118#'s Certificate of Training. Is this thing even useful?
So what do you think? Isn't my Training Center amazing?\r\n#b#L0#You talk like it's so great but there are no strong monsters inside...#l\n#k
No...no strong monsters?! Do you not realize how frightful of a monster a #o0210100# is...!\r\n#b#L0#Um, #o0210100#s are even lower level than #o1210102#s.#l\n#k
Uggh! How did that secret get out?\r\n#b#L0#(You could tell just by fighting the monsters, but you get the hunch it'd be useless to explain that.)#l\n#k
Hmm... Well aside from the #o0210100#s, the #o1210101#s are stronger than the #o1210102#s, aren't they? You can level up in the blink of an eye just hunting them! Here, let me train you personally!
Okay, go hunt #r150 #o1210101#s#k! If you can do it, I will recognize your abilities! Puhaha!
You...you refuse the training? Why? Why is it that no one I train believes in me?

Have you eliminated the #o1210101#s? Ah, I see that my eyes have not deceived me. From the moment I first laid eyes on you, I knew how strong you were.\r\n#b#L0#(Didn't he call you Stan's instrument?)#l\n#k
Hehe... Everyone who trains under me levels up so quickly.
You haven't defeated #r150 #o1210101#s#k yet? Just as I told you! They are stronger than you think!
